website_summaries.verdict: An affordable stainless steel egg beater that works well for small batches of lightweight, thinner batters.
pros: Made of stainless steel so it won't rust
Easy to clean off the blades
Will fit comfortably into any kitchen drawer
cons: It is smaller and narrower than some people were expecting, so it will take more work to effectively whisk your items together

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor design and construction
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor design and construction. The main crank is lose and rocks in the frame. This causes the gears to jam. This is a problem with the design--there are no bearings in the system--the shaft for the main crank/gear simply goes through holes in the frame and these are significantly larger than the diameter of the shaft. This thing is truly a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy H Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Shiny but useless!
customer_reviews.text: If ever you want to have built-in utter frustration, buy this egg beater! It's sure to accomplish that goal...utter frustration! It turns (maybe) for one or two turns and then freezes up...tried it the other way and the same thing happens. Then tried it again and it went like hell (which is what it's supposed to do) for about 10 seconds and then STOPPED quite abruptly and froze! After about 5 minutes of fooling around with this thing and becoming utterly frustrated, I threw it in the garbage can and pulled out my electric mixer!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R

customer_reviews.title: Test it first
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box I tested it and noticed that it squeaks as I turned the handle. Also noticed that one of the beater blades was rotating cockeyed off center. For myself this is an indication of poor workmanship, assemblage and inspection. I am not going to take a chance on reordering the same product.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Try to find a decent egg beater in this day and age of "no one cooks or bakes" is impossible. This was another disappointment. Gears are plastic and "metal" is cheap and will not doubt be useless. Whatever happened to quality?
customer_reviews.author: D@OK

customer_reviews.title: Better than your grandma's egg beater
customer_reviews.text: This all-metal (save for the handle grips) egg beater beats eggs as an egg beater should. I've also used it, off label, to beat pancake mix and it woked perfectly. Don't be afraid to try it with other mixing in the kitchen. It will probably beat whatever you want to mix. Don't try it to beat other items: meat, boxes, and headphones should not be attempted. Although this is a wonderfully heavy duty mixer, mixing things not in the kitchen, such as cement, should not be attempted. I like pancakes and waffles so this is exactly what I was looking for. Seriously. Buy this. It's good.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P.

customer_reviews.title: The Egg Beater is missing!
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes her baking tools - I don't mess with them. When she said the egg beater was missing I thought it would be easy to pick one up. Wrong. I looked in most of the local stores. My friend recommended Amazon. It was there. This product is sturdy, sleek, shiny and does the job - I think - I'm not allowed to use it and haven't seen her cook for while. I did spin it just out of the box and it spun fast and silent. It arrived early and my wife is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Well made stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a 60 years old one that finally got too beat up to beat! So it had big shoes to fill and has done so admirably, I use this often as a lot of the soups t make for my elderly parents have to be pureed so to speak, so it beats more than eggs I use it for mixing batter , mashed potatoes etc, great product
customer_reviews.author: jacqui

customer_reviews.title: A good Replacement for a Hand Beater!
customer_reviews.text: *Our Swedish Hand Beater finally gave out and we needed a suitable heavy duty replacement, for bake goods, whipping cream and stuff you just don't want to use an electrical type on. We do prefer the handle on the side, but for a top hold beater....its pretty hefty. Seems to work well on Waffle Mix and Whipping Cream so far. It is recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ron & Anna Winship

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package I was expecting an all metal, well made appliance (I knew about the plastic gears). What I found was a cheap "Made in China" thing that I could have bought at Wal Mart for half the price. The handle insert and turning knob are plastic, painted to look like steel. The mechanical workings of it are on par with anything I can buy locally at half the price. I bought this to replace one that had fallen apart, one that was built just like this one. I saw great reviews. I thought I did my homework. I thought I was getting something of quality. I was sorely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Mo

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: The rotary mechanism isn't nearly as smooth as the 50 year old egg beater I just had to throw out. It does the job though and since I only use it to mix puddings and jellos it isn't going to get much of a workout. So it's okay for what I need it for. I guess I shouldn't expect today's products to be constructed as solidly as they used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Rosemary R. Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm and is dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.text: Nylon gears mean this one will probably outlast the owner! Rigid gear housing will keep them aligned (compared to the literal antique we had been using). Small "footprint" of the beaters means we can use a smaller vessel -- a cup, for instance -- for smaller amounts, saving room in the dishwasher. Dishwasher safe saves me time in the evening. And... my wife LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.author: William MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: Handy and just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I needed this in my kitchen. Perfect when I don't want to get the electric beater out. This is all metal and it works very well. Couldn't find one like this at any of the stores around here. Arrived the next day ! BB in AZ Unfortunately, after using this hand held beater the first day , it fell apart while whipping up two egg whites. Sending it back !!! :(
customer_reviews.author: BB in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Not worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Really poor quality. I thought this would be a good item for my daughter, who's learning to cook. However, the meshing of the gears is so poor, that this is almost useless as an actual cooking utensil.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Good quality. Doesn't feel like if you get to rough or a kid uses it that it will fall apart. Feels solid and does a great job mixing. Great for camping, off-the-grid cooking, or just don't want to pull out the corded mixture...Just like grandma used. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Hand egg beater.
customer_reviews.text: It was a Birthday gift for a 91 year old man. He was so excited to get it. We have looked in the stores ,and couldn't find it any where, but Amazon has everything you will ever need. Thank you for making an older man so very Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Matranga

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: I use a hand whisk for scrabbled eggs and I'm talking 30 at a time. This mixer has a difficult time breaking up the yolks and I spent more time breaking them by hand. Guess I'll go back to my hand whisk and use this for smaller jobs. It is also quite difficult to clean by hand as I didn't trust putting it in the dishwasher with those nylon teeth. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Zsigray

customer_reviews.title: It works great but there is a plastic gear inside
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I thought it was all metal but there is a plastic gear up inside there. Eventually the gear will wear out but I'm also worried about the plastic which will retain bacteria.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hanson

customer_reviews.title: All but useless.
customer_reviews.text: The beaters were so small and close together that they did a very poor job beating eggs. It was clunky. I used it a couple of times and gave it away to charity.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Purse

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good rotary egg beater
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good rotary egg beater. I read many reviews and chose this brand. It arrived quickly and it does not get stuck as others have stated. I like the handle and feel it is well-made. I had one of these years ago and was worried it wouldn't be as nice or sturdy, but it is. Just what I was wanting.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinegal

customer_reviews.title: Easier to control than electric.
customer_reviews.text: This actually is a replacement for the same model, (which has problems) the new one works great. Mostly used for hand making whip cream for pumpkin pies. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: D Mcgill

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: When the whisk just won't do, this eff beater is the tool to turn to. I was a little worried about it's sturdiness, but it seems to work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: David Spegele

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty cheaply made hope it holds up as I use this gadget a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Bensenberg

customer_reviews.title: I returned Item
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the width of the blades or how high the blades were from the bottom of my bowl. But it does seem to be very sturdy and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: S Moose

customer_reviews.title: Good egg beater!
customer_reviews.text: It has a slight catch when I use it, as though the metal is touching somewhere--but so far has done a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Ann

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Item is cheap and flimsy, beaters mesh when in use, took 2 1/2 months to arrive, return denied because it was past the return allowance date. (item was received after the allowable date) UPDATE, broke on the 2nd use, total JUNK
customer_reviews.author: Ron Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item and they are hard to find I bought 2
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wathey

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% metal. Plastic gears not shown in picture.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it was 100% stainless steel. There are plastic gears that spin the mixing components that you cannot see in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck NYC

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for small jobs. I could not find ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for small jobs . I could not find one near me so I ordered, hoping it would work. It does! It is as described and came in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Uzo

customer_reviews.title: For those small, quick mixing jobs
customer_reviews.text: I needed a hand egg beater for quick mixing or scrambling eggs so I didn't have to pull out the electric mixer. This does just the trick. It's sturdy, easy to turn and so much more handy than the electric!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Giblin

customer_reviews.title: Great Egg Beater
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good egg beater. They are hard to find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Narrow

customer_reviews.title: Robe people hooks.
customer_reviews.text: THey are just cute! And a good price! great stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: LKsadickes

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for scrambled eggs
customer_reviews.text: Does the job for the price. The problem is that the blades are so close together that it will not beat eggs. I'm not talking about jumbo ostrich eggs or anything, standard grade A large chicken eggs are too big for this thing to suck into the beaters and churn up. Besides that they do their job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: The description, "stainless steel blades with chrome handle", and the photo make it look as if the whole thing is chrome plated metal. The product actually has low grade metal blades, possibly not even stainless, and the rest of it is chrome plated plastic. The chrome plating was already chipping off the one delivered to me - terrible product. Quality similar to a child's kitchen toy.
customer_reviews.author: Zen Drive

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Iv'e had it a few months now and used it often. Good piece, worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Keith S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for family replacing a long time used beater. They were thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Happily frothing egg whites to fold into our morning oatmeal!
customer_reviews.text: My husband found this when I struggled to whip egg whites to standing peaks with a fork or round whisk. These work perfect to froth it up and takes me back 50 years to when this tool was the going Joe for mixing up a cake batter or blending moist ingredients. Fun work and builds upper arm muscles. No really! It does!
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, good price can only be used dry before it falls apart
customer_reviews.text: The item fell apart the first time it was used . The beaters fell into the bowl of eggs. The retaining part was not welded to the support allowing the beaters and parts to fall into the mixing bowl. Not a brand name I will every knowingly purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this little beater. I grew up with one, but had no dishwasher and hand washing these things is not fun at all (especially when the cook didn't rinse them off). So I was apprehensive about using it, until I realized I could just chuck it on the top shelf and let it go. Perfect. The big center gear is plastic, but seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: ejw2010

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy feeling as I had hoped, but it gets the job done with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: SeaJaws

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and works great! Love the design. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Danesco Egg Beater
customer_reviews.text: The egg beater arrived on time to another address, as it was a fun gift. The item was in perfect shape. As far as I know it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Kohanek

customer_reviews.title: Good Beater
customer_reviews.text: Works well...the blades are a bit thin, but they do the trick...this egg beater beats eggs and so much more...just not super strong for beating bread dough...gotta' do that by hand! or a big mixer...these wash up well and store well in the gizmo drawer...are comfy to hold and easy to handle/turn the handle.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Its exactly what I wanted. Not a bad item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ciscokid1977

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight but Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This, at first, seems flimsy because its so light but it works a lot better than the old metal one that skips over its gears way too frequently. I am very pleased with this mixer. I hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: IT Walt

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Materials - Probably wont last
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the materials and workmanship was poor. I don't think it will be long before it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Not good for whipping things!
customer_reviews.text: The beaters are so narrow it is impossible to beat egg whites. May be ok to simple mix things but not for eggs or whipping cream! The gears are smooth & appears to be well made but the design is flawed.
customer_reviews.author: Winifred Jackson

customer_reviews.title: ... center so it is not possible to mix things easily. I would definately look for a different egg ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was cheaply made with the gear wheel off center so it is not possible to mix things easily. I would definately look for a different egg beater/mixer.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: The product is very cheaply made and you can easily bend it half
customer_reviews.text: Broken in package when arrived. The product is very cheaply made and you can easily bend it half. Worst product I have purchased yet. The blades are incredibly sharp. Stiches waiting to happen!!! Do not waste your money!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Olive

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: great product, works well was looking for this in the stores around home, nothing. I already had one and needed one for my Mom's house. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The blades are thin and bend too easily, not at all like the one my mom ...
customer_reviews.text: The blades are thin and bend too easily, not at all like the one my mom had when I was growing up.
customer_reviews.author: bJuanita Chastain

customer_reviews.title: I've been searching for a good manual mixer and this has surpassed my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Durable use. I've been searching for a good manual mixer and this has surpassed my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Lupita

customer_reviews.title: Much more fun to use instead of a whisk!
customer_reviews.text: My grown daughter believes in using whisks, but her children and I enjoy turning the handle of the hand beater. So, I'm really buying this for my grandchildren, but giving it to her for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: it does not work as it shold
customer_reviews.text: This beater does not work and does not mix yolks and whites evenly and is flimsy metal.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Easier than a whisk.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great to make my 2 egg omelette this morning. It is so much less effort than using a whisk.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: works great. Got out for my dad
customer_reviews.text: Old school, works great. Got out for my dad. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Avgerinos

customer_reviews.title: Nice metal
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a heavier beater than the plastic ones you find in stores. This is a nice metal and looks like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I've been using forks, electric beaters and mashers instead of getting this product. We lost the original model in one of our overseas moves. This item serves the purpose for which it is designed. I can recommend it without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Maturin

customer_reviews.title: Just beat it.
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed the quality wasn't as good as I would have liked. The beaters are driven by a nylon gear. The beaters aren't very solid and seem to "rattle" loosely. Egg whites stick to the bottom of the beaters and don't get chopped up.
customer_reviews.author: D. Swift

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, piece of junk; Broke after 3rd use
customer_reviews.text: I use a manual rotary beater for one item which I've made only 3 times in the past 6 months. Needless to say, I was extremely disappointed when it broke after third use. Piece of junk. The gears & beaters fell off & are not repairable. Also, too late to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: chrome plastic is not metal and plastic doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Despite descriptions implying sturdy, metal construction, the egg beater is poorly made using plastic parts. The handle is described as "chrome" but it is plastic painted "chrome coloring." The crank shaft wheel wobbles as you spin it. I am returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. McLellan

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: The last one I had - exact same model lasted over two decades. The one I just bought didn't even make it one year!
customer_reviews.author: Steven L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Beaters don't move smoothly - jam into each other- making rotating gears up top difficult to turn- the whole thing is junk, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: James R, Charlotte NC

customer_reviews.title: the beater fell apart after about 10 uses.  it sucks.
customer_reviews.text: there doesn't seem to be an option to return a product that breaks.
customer_reviews.author: T. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply built, did not want such a flimsy one. Price was not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: This utensil is a piece of junk. It is not well made and it doesn't beat an egg thoroughly. I threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: JRP27

customer_reviews.title: Does not reach what you are trying to beat!
customer_reviews.text: This item does not reach what you are trying to beat. To scramble eggs, you have to use it on it's side. I am returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Yendrzeski

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality compared to my old one that came apart after years of use
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Robutz

customer_reviews.title: Terrifically oldfashioned
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted an egg beater just like the one her grandmother used to let her use to make chocolate pudding. I was thrilled to find this and it was a great surprise gift for my daughter at Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: amd1

customer_reviews.title: Oh, so cheaply made and overpriced. SUch a disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: Most of this thing is made of very lightweight plastic. It's nice to have kitchen essentials (that do NOT have to be plugged in), but one has the distnict feeling that this thing might well be broken just sitting in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie F. Fairfax

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality and poorly made. Handle would not crank!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean makes baking with my daughter fun.
customer_reviews.author: danielle r dickson

customer_reviews.title: Danesco 12 inch Egg Beager
customer_reviews.text: I like it for simply beating eggs i.e scrambled eggs, etc. instead of using a whisk.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Roach

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T LAST
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one of these I've purchased...both broke within a month...too late to return....
customer_reviews.author: M L McCune Hagin

customer_reviews.title: rotary gears are good plastic
customer_reviews.text: nice and sturdy seams that it will keep working good
customer_reviews.author: Aaron M. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well, Bake a lot and use it for beating eggs.
customer_reviews.author: DotM

customer_reviews.title: rip off
customer_reviews.text: This piece of crap is flimsy plastic. The beaters are too high and they bend when you wash them. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: rotary egg beater
customer_reviews.text: This little egg beater does a very good when used to beat small portions. I highly recommend this to any cook.
customer_reviews.author: mskit

customer_reviews.title: piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: I knew when I opened the package it was not at all what I'd hoped for. The plastic gears and pieces didn't line up for me and I couldn't even turn the handle without it catching EVERY quarter turn. So frustrating!! I hate wasting money and this was infuriating.
customer_reviews.author: Kacy Heindorff

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE quality. It was so bad it stopped spinning ...
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE quality. It was so bad it stopped spinning the day I got it out of the box, before I even washed it.
customer_reviews.author: jhans

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. Works well. The beaters are a little close together but it works.
customer_reviews.author: CJmomof4

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hubby has to use this kind of egg beater. He is old school about it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Siener

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were just like the old ones that my wife worn out
customer_reviews.author: Herb Budd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product came quickly and was just what I was looking for :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok....
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be well made- only used it once though.
customer_reviews.author: emmielusion

customer_reviews.title: I really like the product.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great! I really like it because here in Costa Rica you can't get one of those!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We were gratified to find that it is all metal.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this item
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this item . Not at all what I expected, very cheaply made and doesn't work well .
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for my old one that froze after 30 years of use.
customer_reviews.author: MsSTK

customer_reviews.title: JAMS UP
customer_reviews.text: worked ok at the onset and then started to jam. very disappointing, AMAZON!
customer_reviews.author: mary smith

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: A basic egg beater and is just what I was looking for! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: bbkatt

customer_reviews.title: Not the best egg beater
customer_reviews.text: Not the best egg beater, within a short period and not being used too much the egg beater fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: RMZ

customer_reviews.title: she was delighted.
customer_reviews.text: gave it to a young woman who'd never seen one...she was delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I remember using one of these as a child and ...
customer_reviews.text: I remember using one of these as a child and wanted to have one of my own. Unfortunately the product does not work well. It seizes up all the time due to poorly aligned plastic gears. I will look for an all metal product in future.
customer_reviews.author: Sjr

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This this broke the first time I used it. It's worthless. Don't waste your money. But something that is not made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marek

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift...my husband loves using it he likes cooking and using things which do not require electricity. there!
customer_reviews.author: J. Qualls

customer_reviews.title: It already broke
customer_reviews.text: I used it 3 times and it already broke. :(
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good stainless steel - just like the old ones.
customer_reviews.author: nancy trense

customer_reviews.title: Not what my wife wanted, too hard to turn.
customer_reviews.text: Not what my wife wanted, too hard to turn. This is another one we had ordered, but then my wife went to a second hand store and found one that is easy to turn. Too bad!
customer_reviews.author: B W

customer_reviews.title: Returned for a refund
customer_reviews.text: The egg beater was made of very lightweight material and felt flimsy. The pin holding the handle fell out after one use. The brace under the rotors kept the rotors from accessing the bottom of the bowl. I returned the egg beater for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally found it!
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for this item for a long time. Had one for many years and hadn't been able to replace it. Whisks just won't do some jobs as well, and it is too much trouble to use an electric mixer for small amounts. This should be in every kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: LaWayne

product_meta.title: Danesco 12-Inch Rotary Egg Beater
product_meta.description: Egg beater, 12-inch / 30,5cm. Manually mix and beat eggs, sauces and dressings. Blends foods quickly and easily with less clean-up than the electric beaters. Stainless steel blades with chrome handle. Dishwasher safe.
feature_bullets: Manually mix and beat eggs, sauces and dressings
Blends foods quickly and easily with less clean-up than the electric beaters
Stainless steel blades with chrome handle

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars394 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
